c74object.name: threadfilter
c74object.digest: Separate out high and low prioity messages
c74object.description: threadfilter filters its input into two streams, those in the low priority thread, and those in the high priority scheduler thread.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Output dependending on which thread the input is in.
method.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority bang and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority bang.

method.name: int
method.digest: Output dependending on which thread the input is in.
method.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority int and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority int.

method.name: float
method.digest: Output dependending on which thread the input is in.
method.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority float and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority float.

method.name: list
method.digest: Output dependending on which thread the input is in.
method.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority list and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority list .

method.name: anything
method.digest: Output dependending on which thread the input is in.
method.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority message and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority message.

entry.name: int
entry.description: Outputs out the left outlet if threadfilter recieves a low priority input and outputs out the right outlet if it recieves a high priority input.
